name: NOGUTU Crystal Crossbody Bags for Women Rhinestone Evening Purse for Women Rhinestone Bags with Chain Wedding for Prom Party
reviews: Literally stunninggg!!! It’s exactly how I wanted it to look and feel, and it looks just like Jaclyn Hill’s purse :) you could find other options of this bag on Amazon but trust me I’ve looked at so many of these bags on the market and none of them, in terms of quality and price, compare to this!! Also it’s the perfect small purse size, not too big but not too small, it’s even slightly bigger than the designer AW bag, which I personally love!! I really love the long chain as well and the fact it comes with a free extra rhinestones for replacement if you ever lose a few. So if you’re deciding on whether to get this, DON’T HESITATE!!!

name: NOGUTU Crystal Crossbody Bags for Women Rhinestone Evening Purse for Women Rhinestone Bags with Chain Wedding for Prom Party
reviews: This bag looks nearly identical to it's original from the outside. Came packaged so nicely! I'm so impressed. Even came with extra rhinestones and settings in case you lose one, but it seems so sturdy, I don't think i'll ever have a use for them! The surface of the bag is quite smooth-- doesn't seem jagged or "snaggy" like the stones/prongs will catch onto delicate or loosely woven/knit fabrics. The extra chain crossbody strap is nice, and the hardware allows you to remove the little leather strap too. Great bag for the value! I hardly write reviews for anything, so this says a lot!!
